name: Dark Awakening (mcolverdesigns)
description: Update 7/6/18:  You fight to survive and escape War Lock's dungeon, while freeing prisoners who don't deserve to be lockup. You can pickup keys, food, and magic, while battling guards, monsters, spiders, and ogres, that roam the dungeon. Be careful of moving walls, fireballs, pits, heated floors, rats, fog, and webbing. Find Red Key's to unlock rooms with magics.
